Class SameGameModel.SameGameTilePosition

java.lang.Object
com.aoopproject.games.samegame.SameGameModel.SameGameTilePosition
Enclosing class:
SameGameModel
public static class SameGameModel.SameGameTilePosition extends Object
Helper inner class to represent a tile's position (row and column) on the game grid. This class is immutable. Used in algorithms like finding connected tiles and for move suggestions. It is declared as public static to be accessible as a type in GameEvent payloads by views or other observers.
